description: Discover the best hotels in Gold Coast, Australia. Find exclusive deals and luxury accommodations.

hotels.title: Surfers Paradise Family Escape with Daily Breakfast, Unlimited Dreamworld Entry & Two Kids Stay Free
hotels.description: Run away to where it's sunnier in the heart of Surfers Paradise. This high-rise stay puts you just 100 metres from the beach and steps from the precinct’s famous dining, shopping and nightlife. Each modern room offers sweeping views of city, hinterland or ocean, with private balconies and thoughtful comforts throughout. After a day of exploration, unwind by the lagoon-style pool with palms overhead, or rejuvenate in the fully equipped gymnasium, steam room, and sauna. Savor delectable cuisine at the on-site Fables Restaurant and enjoy a relaxing drink at Tales Bar. With unlimited access to Dreamworld, you and the crew can come and go as you please - ducking between rollercoasters and full-throttle family fun. You’ll also score unlimited entry to the SkyPoint Observation Deck, perched on Level 77 of the iconic Q1 building, where views stretch from skyline to sea and lush hinterland.

hotels.title: Beachfront Surfers Paradise Apartments for Four Guests with Unlimited Dreamworld & SkyPoint Entry
hotels.description: Soaring above the golden sands of Surfers Paradise, this hotel places you steps from the buzzing Esplanade, with the Pacific Ocean as your daily backdrop and Cavill Avenue’s boutiques and nightlife just a stroll away. Wake to the sound of rolling waves before plunging into the outdoor pool or take a leisurely dip in the heated indoor pool, then wander to the lush picnic area for a relaxed afternoon barbecue with friends. Evenings invite a soak in the hot tub or a sunset drink on the landscaped terrace, as the city lights flicker to life along the coast. With unlimited access to Dreamworld, you and the crew can come and go as you please - ducking between rollercoasters and full-throttle family fun. You’ll also score unlimited entry to the SkyPoint Observation Deck, perched on Level 77 of the iconic Q1 building, where views stretch from skyline to sea and lush hinterland.

hotels.title: Family-Friendly Gold Coast Apartments with Waterpark, Unlimited Dreamworld Entry & SkyPoint Access
hotels.description: Family escapes don’t get much better than at this fun-filled, two-bedroom apartment stay on the sunny Gold Coast, with unlimited access to Dreamworld included. But the fun doesn’t stop there - Turtle Beach Resort features a wealth of activities the entire family can get behind, including Splash Zone Water Park, Club Turtle Kids Club, a mini-golf course, a cinema, four swimming pools, an arcade and more. When you’re ready to head out, you’ll find the golden sands of Mermaid Beach just a few minutes away; Dreamworld is a 40-minute drive away. Return to your self-contained apartment, equipped with a fully equipped kitchen, spacious lounge room and dedicated laundry. Made for families - this haven is where kids can be kids and parents can truly unwind.

hotels.title: Gold Coast Award-Winning Family-Friendly Stay with Unlimited Dreamworld Entry, Daily Breakfast & Two Kids Stay Free
hotels.description: Captivating beaches and endless entertainment await on the Gold Coast, home to this five-star resort nestled between sun-soaked sand and lush hinterland. Relax at One Spa, savour signature Mediterranean flavours at Amici or enjoy bold Japanese cuisine at Arakawa. RACV Royal Pines Resort is ideal for family fun, with heated pools, slides, a splash park, a jumping pillow and a playground. The resort also boasts three 18-hole, par-72 combination golf courses - including a championship course - as well as five tennis courts. Perfectly located to make the most of the area, RACV Royal Pines Resort is the ideal launchpad for exploring the region’s world-class beaches, exceptional restaurants, striking hinterland and theme parks. Get unlimited entry to Dreamworld for nonstop thrills whenever you like. Plus, take in sweeping views of the Gold Coast from SkyPoint, high above the beach in the iconic Q1 building.

hotels.vendor_name: Village Roadshow Theme Parks Pty Ltd t/a Sea World Resort & Water Park
hotels.title: Bestselling Sea World Resort for Ultimate Family Fun
hotels.description: Treat the family to the ultimate Gold Coast adventure with a stay at Sea World Resort, located on the glittering Gold Coast’s Main Beach, adjacent to Sea World. Discover adrenaline-pumping action and uncover underwater mysteries at The New Atlantis, Sea World's newest and most immersive entertainment precinct, featuring a host of brand-new attractions - experience sky-high thrills on iconic wooden coaster The Leviathan, brave the colossal currents of the Vortex and decipher ancient glyphs in The Garden of Cyphers. Little ones can make a splash at the SpongeBob aqua play area, while adults can unwind at luxury onsite spa Sea World Resort Relaxation Corporation. Finish carefree days at the award-winning Hatsuhana Japanese Restaurant, pull up a seat at Shoreline Restaurant for bites inspired by the ocean or soak up some sun at Boatshed Bar & Grill.

hotels.title: Fun-Filled Gold Coast Escape Minutes from Coolangatta Beach with Two Pools, Poolside BBQ & Mini Golf Course
hotels.description: Feel the warmth of endless summer at this sunny sanctuary on the Gold Coast, offering family-friendly fun and sun-kissed splendour in equal measure. Enjoy direct access to the Twin Towns Clubs & Resorts complex, teeming with bars, restaurants and live events. Take on family or friends at the tennis courts, mini golf course or games room, then unwind in the indoor pool or sauna or take it easy at the outdoor pool and BBQ stations while you cook up a feast.

hotels.title: Self-Contained Gold Coast Apartment Escape Moments from the Beachfront
hotels.description: Experience the Gold Coast's most iconic and stylish holiday apartments staying at the AVANI Broadbeach Residences. Enjoy views over the glitz and glamour of Broadbeach in a self-contained apartment with a fully equipped kitchen, and marvel at the sun-kissed glow of the dazzling coastline, dotted with award-winning restaurants, cafés and world-class entertainment. A serene beachside setting meets an impeccable list of facilities, including BBQ amenities, an onsite pool, undercover secure parking and fully equipped fitness centre. Make the AVANI Broadbeach Residences your perfect launchpad to explore the beautiful beaches, wildlife sanctuaries, and bustling neighbourhoods of this enchanting part of South East Queensland.

hotels.vendor_name: Imperial Hotel Gold Coast (Formerly Palazzo Versace)
hotels.title: Waterfront Gold Coast Luxury with Poolside Dining & Private Marina
hotels.description: The pinnacle of luxury awaits at Imperial Hotel Gold Coast. From the moment you lay eyes on the Italian exterior and grand lobby shimmering under the sparkling chandelier, you'll know you've arrived somewhere exceptional. Savour exquisite dining at Il Barocco Restaurant, take time to lounge by the 60-metre lagoon pool or explore the Gold Coast's many attractions - including boutique shopping destination, Marina Mirage.

hotels.title: Central Gold Coast Apartments Minutes from Beach with Restaurant, BBQ Facilities & Pool
hotels.description: Experience the best of the iconic Gold Coast with a stay at Wyndham Surfers Paradise, perched mere minutes from sandy shores. This high-rise haven is ideally located for exploring the area's world-class surf beaches and gourmet dining scene. As evening falls, retreat to your condo-style apartments to savour breathtaking views, unwind in the hotel's chic cafe and bar, cool-off by the pool and embrace life in this seaside town.

hotels.title: Luxe QT Gold Coast Escape with Miami-Inspired Pool Area
hotels.description: Experience the magic of sun-drenched Surfers Paradise firsthand with a stay at QT Gold Coast, a retro-glam, designer hotel packed with all kinds of excitement and intrigue. From the luminous pool and the myriad of sophisticated restaurants to the indulgent spa, there is no shortage of wondrous experiences to be found within the hotel. When the time comes to venture further, this designer haven provides complimentary retro bicycles to explore. Cavill Avenue is nearby, along with bustling Broadbeach and the Gold Coast’s famous theme parks, all within a 30-minute drive.

hotels.vendor_name: The Star Grand at The Star Gold Coast
hotels.title: Iconic Five-Star Luxury at The Star Grand Gold Coast with World-Class Dining & Onsite Spa
hotels.description: Embrace the beauty of the Gold Coast - where sandy shores meet unrivalled glitz and glamour - with a five-star stay at The Star Grand Gold Coast, in the heart of Broadbeach. This exceptional property is part of the Gold Coast’s entertainment destination, The Star, and is just moments from pristine beaches, shopping precincts and vibrant nightlife. Savour world-class dining across The Star's 14 destinations, including the acclaimed Nineteen at The Star or indulge in a tranquil spa treatment.

hotels.title: Family Apartment Escape on Gold Coast's Broadbeach
hotels.description: Dazzling sun-kissed coastlines and pristine white sand await when you escape to Aria Apartments - a family-friendly hotel perfectly positioned in the heart of Gold Coast's iconic Broadbeach. Tower over the glitz and glamour as you relax amid the glorious 'Broadie' atmosphere with a stay in a gorgeous, fully equipped apartment. Aria Apartments is nestled between The Star Gold Coast, Broadbeach Surf Life Saving Club, and Kurrawa Surf Club, surrounded by trendy cafés, alfresco dining, ultra-cool bars and an unmissable shopping district, offering an expansive collection of luxury brands. You don't have to step outside the property's doors to enjoy the magic, either. Aria Apartments has an impeccable list of facilities to keep you entertained, including a heated 25-metre outdoor pool, BBQ area, gymnasium, sauna and steam baths, and a 12-seater private cinema.

hotels.title: Gold Coast: Broadbeach Resort-Style Apartment Luxury
hotels.description: Discover your home-away-from-home at The Star Residences Gold Coast, where resort-style apartments provide a luxurious base for your Gold Coast escape. If you can tear yourself away from your immaculate, self-contained abode, head to the sky-high swimming pool on level 20 and enjoy dazzling city views, or make the most of the yoga pavilion and casual eating areas. You'll be in a prime location to explore the many dining options available at The Star Gold Coast complex.

hotels.title: Gold Coast Escape near Surfers Paradise Beach & Pacific Fair
hotels.description: Seek surf, sand and sunshine at Oaks Gold Coast Hotel, where a prime location takes the spotlight. The famous champagne shores of the Gold Coast are an easy five-minute stroll away, with retail therapy at Pacific Fair a 10-minute drive from the resort. The glitzy restaurants, shopping and nightlife of Surfers Paradise are just a six-minute drive away, with plenty of family fun to be had at the nearby theme parks. After a long day of exploring, return to your resort and slide straight into the turquoise swimming pool to cool off - pure bliss!

hotels.title: Five-Star Gold Coast Langham Luxury near Surfers Paradise with Six Restaurants & Bars & Signature Spa
hotels.description: Soar to new heights of Gold Coast glamour with a sensational stay at a sun-kissed oasis just moments from the spectacular shores of Broadbeach. Luxuriate from the moment your experience at The Langham Gold Coast begins - bathe in two glittering resort-style pools, unwind at the spa and dine and drink across six world-class restaurants and bars, including the iconic Palm Court afternoon tea lounge.

hotels.title: Coastal Cool Rydges Stay near Gold Coast Airport
hotels.description: Step off the plane and straight into the glamorous Gold Coast lifestyle with a stay at Rydges Gold Coast Airport, located just five minutes from the domestic and international terminals. Walk just moments to golden Kirra Beach, then enjoy the very best of the southern Gold Coast with prime surf, cute cafés, craft breweries, and local marketplaces all within close reach. When you return from your adventures, relax at The Salty Fox Rooftop Bar or be taken on a culinary journey at Madame Za.

hotels.title: Gold Coast Luxe Self-Contained One & Two-Bedroom Apartments Overlooking Kirra Beach
hotels.description: X marks the spot for your new favourite family escape at X Kirra Apartments, perfectly positioned on the southern Gold Coast's sparkling shores. Each apartment offers light-filled luxe living and spectacular views over the shimmering Pacific Ocean or hinterland. Beaming above the shimmering sands of Kirra Beach, just moments from world-class surf, top-notch dining and Gold Coast Airport, this sophisticated complex will be your home away from home when exploring the region's extraordinary natural wonders and theme parks.

hotels.vendor_name: The Darling - The Star Gold Coast
hotels.title: Gold Coast Suite Glamour at The Star with High-End Bars, Restaurants & Spa
hotels.description: Spoil yourself with a stay in one of the indulgent luxury suites at The Darling at The Star Gold Coast. This award-winning hotel is mere moments from the bustling Broadbeach dining scene, chic boutiques of Pacific Fair Shopping Centre and Surfers Paradise Beach. All of The Star Gold Coast's signature dining, casual eateries and glamourous bars are at your disposal, and the plush Azure Spa & Fitness facilities and pool are conveniently located onsite for your relaxation.

hotels.title: Coastal-Cool Vibe Surfers Paradise Riverside Escape near Famous Esplanade
hotels.description: Gorgeously glitzy, retro-inspired Miami pool club vibes with a relaxed, coastal-cool style welcome you to the flawless shores and turquoise waters of Surfers Paradise at Vibe Hotel Gold Coast. Offering superb access to the famous Esplanade, this trendy hotel oozes seaside charm blended with upscale living, featuring poolside cabanas, lush foliage and the Driftwood Social eatery, all overlooking the tranquil Nerang River. Spectacularly located steps from Cavill Avenue, right in the heart of Surfers Paradise with a tram stop less than five minutes away, Vibe Hotel Gold Coast is the ultimate launchpad to this glittering holiday destination - whether you want to get up close to marine life at Sea World, lounge on the shores of the Gold Coast’s most iconic beachfront or get lost among Pacific Fair’s 400 retail stores.
